name: Puzzle Powered
description:
This is a game about building your own spaceship and surviving against hordes of space insects!

Controls:

Combat:
WASD/Arrow Keys - move
Spacebar/Left Mouse Button - shoot
Build:
Drag and drop with left mouse button
Click on the bottom table to slide it up and down for parts
Buying a part will spawn it to the right of the table

Ship Part Guide:
Thruster - Gives the ship the ability to move.  The more you have the faster you go.  You must have at least 1 thruster to move.
Connector Block - No special effects, just a cheap way to add more space to your ship.
Health Block - increases the health of all modules by 1.
Yellow Repeater Cannon - Med/Low Damage - Medium Fire Rate
Pink Shotgun - Med/High Damage - Low Fire Rate
Green Gatling - High Fire Rate - Low Damage 

This was made in UCSD's VGDC 48 Hour Spring  Game Jam 2019 
Credits
Arren De Manuel - Mechanics and Programming
Aiden Jauffret - Music, Art, and SFX
